sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Text, Button } from '@chakra-ui/react';

const ColorOverview = ({ themeColors }) => {
  const {
    black,
    body,
    global,
    hoverBorder,
    lightColor,
    ltColorBackgroundDark,
    ltColorBackgroundDefault,
    ltColorBackgroundLight,
    ltColorBlack,
    ltColorBorderDark,
    ltColorBorderDefault,
    ltColorBorderLight,
    ltColorGray100,
    ltColorGray200,
    ltColorGray300,
    ltColorGray400,
    ltColorGray500,
    ltColorGray600,
    ltColorGray700,
    ltColorGray800,
    ltColorGray900,
    ltColorOverlayDark,
    ltColorOverlayDefault,
    ltColorOverlayTransparent,
    ltColorTextDark,
    ltColorTextDefault,
    ltColorTextLight,
    ltColorTextVeryLight,
    ltColorTransparent,
    ltColorWhite,
    ltShadowWebsiteOverlay,
    ltShadowActive,
    ltShadowDefault,
    outlineColor,
    talkTagColor,
    whiteColor,
  } = themeColors;

  // Function to copy color code to clipboard
  const copyToClipboard = (text) => {
    navigator.clipboard.writeText(text);
  };

  return (
    <Box>
      <Box mb={4}>
        <Text fontSize="lg" fontWeight="bold" mb={2} color="brand.800">
          Additional Theme Colors
        </Text>
        <Box>
          <Box display="flex" alignItems="center" mb={2}>
            <Box w="30px" h="30px" mr={2} bg={black} borderRadius="md" border="1px solid #ccc" />
            <Text color="brand.800" mr={2}>black</Text>
            <Text color="brand.800">{black}</Text>
            <Button ml={2} size="sm" colorScheme="brand" onClick={() => copyToClipboard(black)}>
              Copy
            </Button>
          </Box>
          <Box display="flex" alignItems="center" mb={2}>
            <Box w="30px" h="30px" mr={2} bg={body} borderRadius="md" border="1px solid #ccc" />
            <Text color="brand.800" mr={2}>body</Text>
            <Text color="brand.800">{body}</Text>
            <Button ml={2} size="sm" colorScheme="brand" onClick={() => copyToClipboard(body)}>
              Copy
            </Button>
          </Box>
          {/* Add similar Box components for each color */}
        </Box>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default ColorOverview;
